question: You relocated to a new country for work. Write to your previous co-worker. In your letter– Tell him/her where you live in the new country– Describe how you feel– Explain what you are doing at work– Invite him/her for a visit.
text: Hope you are doing good and your family. You know very well about me that I was looking for a software testing job in the USA. I have got an opportunity recently that my client recruits me and arranged all my expenses to migrate to the US. I have recently migrated to the USA 2 weeks ago.

I am staying in Foster City,CA which is very near to my office. Besides, the climate is awesome and feel fresh air here. People here at my apartment are very friendly and helped me to settle over here.
I am happy at my work that my duties are collecting requirements from the business and testing the software and report defects to the developer which makes my job very satisfactory.

I know you are good at photographs and you're professional too. I invite you can also have a vacation with your family this summer here at Foster city which you may also feel the same freshness. People usually here would go to the beach in the summers. So it would be better you can come here in this summer along with your family and spend more time together.
Convey my regards to your family.

error_list.error_des: It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
